Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by Boston in 1969...
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by Boston in 1969...
Released by Boston on 5/5/1969...
Drafted in 3rd round, 57th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1972...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1975, off Bob Babcock (LA)...
Injured on 7/13/1975 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 8/20/1977, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Traded from New York (N) to Cleveland on 7/21/1978 (Going to NYM: RF L. Herndon. Going to CLE: C R. Hodges, SS D. Cripe, P G. Zahn)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Detroit on 5/3/1980...
Injured on 6/7/1980 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/29/1985 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/9/1986 to a 4-year deal worth $1,610,000 per year...
